ATT: Mr. Seymour Siegel
General Manager
Dear Mr. Siegel:
Following up our conversation yesterday morning, we are
pleased to quote you on our Model 706 FM Educational Broadcast Trans¬
mitter.
This is priced at $1,595*00 f.o.b. Long Island City,
complete with crystal and one set of tubes. Price of Model 706 Single
Ring Antenna is $25.00. Further accessory items will "be announced in
the. next week or ten days.
Both of these items can he delivered in about four to
six weeks and after that we estimate that deliveries can he made vir¬
tually immediately.
FAG/mkm
Very truly yours,
Frank A. Gunther
Vice President
